articles.description: In a new study, cerebral glucose metabolism was linked to physical activity, helping scientists tease apart how exercise helps the brain.
articles.content:
Physical activity has long
 been associated with a decreased risk for dementia, but no one is sure exactly how it protects the brain. Researchers at the Institut Blood and Brain at the University of… [+3243 chars]
